name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
description: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round: Create Omni Element ×1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:</color> Create $[K411] ×1 and your current active character gains 1 $[K310]. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:</color> Create <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×1 and your current active character gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)
storytext: Arataki "He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto" is always game for another round!
